definitions.definition: That rotates the plane of polarized light to the left , or counter-clockwise . Notation: (−) or formerly lowercase l- .
examples: Levofloxacin is the levorotatory enantiomer of the medication ofloxacin.
labels: of an optically active compound or crystal
label_groups: of an optically active compound or crystal

main_definition: ( chemistry ) ( of an optically active compound or crystal ) That rotates the plane of polarized light to the left , or counter-clockwise . Notation: (−) or formerly lowercase l- .
